text.0: if indra thou hast given that gracious hearing where with thou helpest those who sang thy praises.
text.1: blast not the wish that would exalt us may i gain all from thee and pay all mans devotions.
text.2: let not the sovran indra disappoint us in what shall bring both sisters to our dwelling.
text.3: to him have run the quickly flowing waters may indra come to us with life and friendship.
text.4: victorious with the men hero in battles indra who hears the singers supplication.
text.5: will bring his car nigh to the man who offers if he himself upholds the songs that praise him.
text.6: yea indra with the men through love of glory consumes the sacred food which friends have offered.
text.7: the everstrengthening song of him who worships is sung in fight amid the clash of voices.
text.8: aided by thee o maghavan o indra may we subdue our foes who count them mighty.
text.9: be our protector strengthen and increase us may we find strengthening food in full abundance.
